summary: This is an email forwarding a link to an NBC News opinion article titled 'Jeffrey Epstein's slap on the wrist raises a lot of questions' from December 11, 2018. The email suggests the sender is sharing the article with others, indicating awareness and discussion of Epstein's controversial plea deal.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The forwarded article discusses his controversial plea deal and raises questions about it.

events.title: Article about Epstein's plea deal published
events.description: An NBC News opinion article titled 'Jeffrey Epstein's slap on the wrist raises a lot of questions' is published and shared via email.

keyFacts: An opinion article critical of Jeffrey Epstein's plea deal was published by NBC News on or before December 11, 2018.
The article's title characterizes Epstein's legal outcome as a 'slap on the wrist' and suggests it raises many questions.
The article was actively shared via email, indicating it was a topic of discussion among the correspondents.
